title: Anyone else not able to start the new client?
body: After I downloaded thew new client for the beta I can launch the client once a day except if i restart my pc. I click open but iot just doe nothing. I try opening the legacy client but it says another version of league of legends is running. Pls help.

replies.body: Check your task manager and close it, then re-run, there was an auto update so it may have glitched and gotten stuck so try opening task manager by right clicking the toolbar on the bottom of your screen and selecting Task Manager, then look for any of the riot programs and end the tasks.

> [{quoted}](name=tempevrdchalxkus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ftGAVvI3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-13T03:27:13.382+0000)
>
> Check your task manager and close it, then re-run, there was an auto update so it may have glitched and gotten stuck so try opening task manager by right clicking the toolbar on the bottom of your screen and selecting Task Manager, then look for any of the riot programs and end the tasks.

MA BOI! YOU SAVED ME. Thanks dude.
